eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Mohave, AZ; AT 09:05 PM ON OCT 16, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:10 AM OCT 21, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Safe Alert has been issued for Mohave County. The Bullhead City Police Department is looking for 79 year old Thomas Edward Boone. Thomas is a white male, 5 feet 10 inches tall, 188 pounds, with long white beard and blue eye. Thomas was last seen wearing a baseball or fedora style hat, unknown colored shirt and shorts, and black dress shoes. Thomas was last seen on 10/16/2025 at 5:30 P.M. on foot in the area of 1500 block of Lincoln Lane. Thomas suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. Please contact Bullhead City Police at 928 763 9200 or call 911 with any information.. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
